Command Line Utilites¶

Annotate both mates of paired-end alignments

usage: annnot [-h] [-b BFILE] [-g GFILE] [-r RFILE] [-o OFILE]
Options:
-b BAM file(s). A single aligment file contains all paired-end mates, or a comma separated list of 2 files, one per each set of mates (useful when mate origin is important).
-g GTF file. Annotation file with biotype information
-r BED file. Annotation file with repeats information
-o=output STR. Name of output file. Default = “output”
